page.title: 09GLADSTONE PARK LONDON NW10
page.content:
{SIZE: }98 acres {AMENITIES: }Tennis courts, cricket pitches, putting green, football pitches, playground, swimming pool and formal gardens.
{DOLLIS HILL HOUSE William Gladstone,former Prime Minister of Great Britain, lived here from 1882-1896.The park is named after him.The house is now a catering college and is also used for wedding receptions and other large celebrations.
{MEMORIAL Within the park is a memorial to those who died in the Nazi concentration camps from 1934-1945.
FOR SURVEY OF PARK SEE NEXT PAGE
